summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs is responsible for ensuring that veterans have reasonable access to burial options in a national or state veterans’ cemetery. It defines reasonable access as a cemetery within 75 miles of veterans’ homes. It estimated that about 92% of veterans had reasonable access in fiscal year 2018. VA’s National Cemetery Administration has a plan to establish 18 new national cemeteries to...
title: Veterans Affairs: Additional Actions Needed to Increase Veterans' Burial Access
